title: Test login system authentication flows
description: As a QA engineer, I want to verify the login system handles valid credentials, invalid attempts, and edge cases correctly so that users can securely access the application.

acceptanceTests.description: Invalid credentials are rejected with appropriate error message
Account lockout occurs after 3 failed attempts
Session expires after configured timeout period

tasks.description: Set up test data with valid user accounts
Create automated test scripts for authentication flows
